metadata.title: DPM Dar, Azerbaijan Economy Minister reaffirm commitment to advance investment cooperation

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Apr 29 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister, Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Tuesday held a telephone conversation with Azerbaijan's Minister of Economy, Mikkayil Jabbarov. During the conversation, they discussed progress on ongoing development and investment initiatives, according to a press release issued by the Foreign Office Spokesperson. Both sides also affirmed their strong bilateral ties and committed to working closely to advance investment cooperation and enhance mutual understanding of priority projects under consideration.
